dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Heat resistant material; High-temperature material; Refractory substance; Fireproof material; Thermal material; Insulating material; Refractory ceramics; Refractory bricks; Refractory castables; Refractory concrete; Refractory cement; Refractory coatings; Refractory clays; Refractory linings; Refractory aggregates

Heat resistant material; High-temperature material; Refractory substance; Fireproof material; Thermal material; Insulating material; Refractory ceramics; Refractory bricks; Refractory castables; Refractory concrete; Refractory cement; Refractory coatings; Refractory clays; Refractory linings; Refractory aggregates
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The Description for the product flow of refractory material indicates a high-temperature resistant substance, typically used in furnaces, reactors, kilns or other high-heat environments. It outlines the degree of processing, conformance to standards, quality indicators, applications, manufacturing process, and input materials used. The description will also designate if the refractory material is provided as part of a production or consumption mix, and will detail the point of availability, such as 'to consumer' or 'at plant'. Specific characteristics such as thermal resistance, chemical composition, and physical form are often included.
耐火材料的产品流描述表示这是一种耐高温的物质，通常用于炉子、反应器、窑炉或其他高热环境。它概述了加工程度、符合的标准、质量指标、应用程序、制造过程以及所使用的输入材料。描述还将指明耐火材料是作为生产或消费混合物的一部分提供，以及详细说明可用性点，例如'对消费者'或'在工厂'。通常还包括热阻性、化学成分和物理形态等具体特性。
